Property.name: sa1dash
Property.HelpText: Remove the Spin Dash delay to make it more like SA1.

Property.name: sa1speed
Property.HelpText: Increase the speed of the spin dash.

Property.name: sa1SFX
Property.HelpText: Use the original SA1 Sound Effects when jumping and spin dashing. (Might not work with CWE or CharSel mod.)

Property.name: jumpBall
Property.HelpText: In SA1, when you jump and Homing Attack, Sonic uses a ball form, this option will restore it. (Also apply for Shadow).

Property.name: superBounce
Property.HelpText: Increase the speed of the bounce to make you go higher.

Property.name: SpinDashSomersault
Property.display: Spin Dash can pass Somersault obstacles
Property.HelpText: [EXPERIEMNTAL] Allow the Spin Dash to pass through somersault obstacles, this creates a small issue with slope physics, so be aware.

Property.name: LightDashButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Light Dash button. (Apply for every speed character).

Property.name: BounceButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Bounce button. (Apply for every speed character).

Property.name: SpinDashButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Spin Dash button. (Apply for every speed character).

Property.name: SomersaultButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Somersault button. (Apply for every speed character).

Property.name: shieldButton
Property.HelpText: Select Metal Sonic Black Shield switch button.

Property.name: pickButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Pick object button.

Property.name: putButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Put object button.

Property.name: grabButton
Property.HelpText: Select the Grab object button.

Property.name: petButton
Property.HelpText: Select the pet button.

Property.name: gravityButton
Property.HelpText: Select the CG switch button.

Property.name: sonicGrunt
Property.HelpText: Allow Sonic grunt sound when Homing Attack.

Property.name: shBounce
Property.HelpText: Allow Shadow to bounce.

Property.name: shGrunt
Property.HelpText: Allow Shadow grunt sound when Homing Attack.

Property.name: amyGrunt
Property.HelpText: Allow Amy grunt sound when Homing Attack.

Property.name: spindashMS
Property.HelpText: Allow Metal Sonic to Spin Dash.

Property.name: bsLimit
Property.HelpText: Make Black Shield faster to use and remove speed caps.
